name: Upside Down (itch) (JoshYKC)
description:
Upside Down is a 2D reflex/precision arcade game

Destroy the pursuing blocks before they reach the top. This prototype takes a little longer as I expected, that was due to experimenting with a concept I’d like to called ‘Territorial Invasion’. Though that never made the cut, it would be nice to share with my readers about it. It simply involve the pursuing blocks takes over the player’s space as they reach the top. Stacking on top of one another to reduce the player’s hope of surviving (inspired by Tetris).

---

How To Play?

You play as the pink box at the top, your goal is to prevent the white boxes from reaching the top. get as many score as you can!

  1. Arrow or AD keys to move left / right.
  2. Spacebar or S or ZX to drop.
  3. Press any key to continue on Game Over screen.
Credits

Prototoype made by Joshua Yau
With game engine Stencyl
